title: Shopify Dev Services Section Fields

fields.label: Heading
fields.name: heading
fields.default_value: We Provide All Inclusive Shopify Development Services

fields.label: Description
fields.name: description
fields.default_value: Our flexible process ensures seamless collaboration, allowing for successful and efficient project delivery, every time.

default_value.service_description: Our expert Shopify development services will have you up and running in no time, perfectly configured to your needs.

bullet_points.bullet_text: Comprehensive Store Build: From theme selection/custom design to complete setup and configuration.
Rapid Launch: Get your fully functional Shopify store ready to launch in days or weeks.
Full-Service Support: We handle theme installation, design, development, and configuration for a seamless launch.
Payment Setup: We offer help with integrating third party solutions for payment gateway setup.
Custom Domain Configuration: Buy domain, update DNS settings, point to host, configure records, set SSL, verify propagation, test site.

default_value.service_description: Whether it's a pre-existing theme or needs a completely custom design, we can help you get it done quickly.

bullet_points.bullet_text: Pixel perfect: Code-level theme implementation using HTML, CSS, and Liquid.
App setup & Support: Seamless integration of third-party apps and APIs.
Custom functionality development: Custom scripts, animations, and dynamic elements can be built to as per your liking.
Optimized Navigation & Search: Guide your customers effortlessly with optimized navigation and powerful search capabilities.

default_value.service_description: Extend your store's functionality through seamless setup, configuration, and customization for your cart, checkout, pages and for overall data collection.

bullet_points.bullet_text: Custom Solutions: If your business needs a unique solution, we'll build custom solutions backed by our 10+ years of shopify experience.
Platform-Specific Expertise: We build custom apps for Shopify Admin, POS, and Online Store.
Top-Tier App Integrations: Seamlessly integrate Klaviyo, Mailchimp, AMP, Google Shopping, Metafields Editor, Nitro Wishlist, Omnisend, Email Marketing, Product Reviews, SMS, and more.

default_value.service_description: BrillMark optimizes website performance through site analysis, image compression, code optimization, caching, CDN integration, lazy loading, server improvements, and continuous monitoring to enhance speed and SEO.

bullet_points.bullet_text: Performance-Driven Development: We optimize custom themes and apps for speed and efficiency.
Image Optimization & Code Minification: Implement best practices for image compression and clean code.
Third-Party App Optimization: Ensure installed apps are optimized and do not negatively impact load times.

default_value.service_description: BrillMark offers Shopify Plus upgrades and maintenance, including seamless theme updates, app integrations, performance enhancements, security patches, and ongoing support to ensure optimal store functionality.

bullet_points.bullet_text: Data Migration Expertise: Seamlessly migrate your existing store data to Shopify or Shopify Plus.
Mobile-First Design: Ensure a flawless shopping experience across devices while implying best CRO practices.
Personalized Training: Empower your team with training to utilise Shopify plus's advanced capabilities.

default_value.service_description: Website Rebranding & Redesign driven by our conversion rate experimentation expertise. Maximize impact with proven designs and a streamlined development process.

bullet_points.bullet_text: Tested Designs: We leverage winning templates and data-driven insights for optimal conversion.
Conversion-Focused Approach: Our CRO expertise ensures every redesign element improves user engagement and sales.
Efficient Development: Easy-to-use, developer-friendly mockups minimize delays and ensure a smooth redesign process.

default_value.service_description: BrillMark offers GA4 setup, attribution configurations, custom events and conversions, and advanced user tracking to ensure accurate data collection and optimize marketing strategies.

bullet_points.bullet_text: Data-Driven Decisions: We set up Google Analytics, Hotjar, and more to track performance.
Analytical Team Expertise: Our team excels in Looker Studio, CRM dashboards, and Shopify analytics.
Leakage & Discrepancy Solutions: We identify and resolve data discrepancies with our GTM expertise.

default_value.service_description: BrillMark crafts bespoke Shopify stores, blending beautiful design with strategic functionality.

bullet_points.bullet_text: Brand-Tailored Stores: We build fully functional Shopify stores reflecting your brand's unique identity.
Mobile-First & UX Focused: Creating a seamless and intuitive shopping experience for all users.
SEO & CRO Optimized: Maximizing visibility and sales through strategic design and implementation.

default_value.service_description: BrillMark offers help to your brand with Headless Commerce, delivering unmatched flexibility, performance, and omnichannel reach on the Shopify platform.

bullet_points.bullet_text: Unmatched Flexibility: Decouple your frontend for complete design and content freedom.
Performance Boost: Experience lightning-fast loading speeds and optimized user interactions.

description: Shopify Development Services section with tabbed navigation on desktop and stacked cards on mobile.
